content: hey guys I wanted to show you a little trick for giving weight to the 2.5 D
next modular cave walls and here I've gathered my materials and I'm ready to

the center there and then I'll give me a nice Corps of weight to this okay so I'm
going to put some white glue on top of that and then I'm gonna add some water
down white glue a little saturate and soak into the sand so I'll roll it up
like a cigar and set it off for a second and I got my second sheet and this will
be the outer sheet so I'll just put some white glue on that and then I'll roll
the core up into the center just like a cigar and now I've got it rolled up I'm
going to pinch the ends and put some white glue on them to help secure and

and then I'll just let it dry and I had some water glued to the bottom when it
